post.description:
Generates a PNG file in 4 channel RGBA format with the cutout operation
applied to the input image \
 Generates a PNG file in 3 channel RGB format with the mask operation applied to the input image.\
 To get status of this job, call [Status API](./#operation/icstatus).\
 To know more about this feature refer [Remove Background](../features/#remove-background)

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

post.description:
Generates a mask PNG.
To get status of this job, call [Status API](./#operation/icstatus).\
 To know more about this feature refer [Image Mask](../features/#image-mask)

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

get.summary: Get the status of a job for Remove Background and Create Mask
get.description: Returns the status of a job. Please expand `200 Successful operation` under `Responses` to know details of the status returned.

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The jobId to get status for.

post.description:

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

post.description:
Playback photoshop actions in actionJSON format.
To get status of this job, call [Status API](./#operation/pitsstatus). \
 To know more about this feature refer [Rendering Conversions](../features/#rendering--conversions)

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://image.adobe.io/pie/psdService/actionJSON \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer $token' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-api-key: $x-api-key' \
  --data '{"inputs": [{"href": "string","storage": "external"}],"options": {"actionJSON": [{"_obj": "crop","angle": {"_unit": "angleUnit","_value": 0.0},\
"constrainProportions": false,"cropAspectRatioModeKey": {"_enum": "cropAspectRatioModeClass","_value": "pureAspectRatio"},"delete": true,"to": {"_obj": "rectangle","bottom": {"_unit": "pixelsUnit","_value": 469.0},"left": {"_unit": "pixelsUnit","_value": 0.0},"right": {"_unit": "pixelsUnit","_value": 750.0},"top": {"_unit": "pixelsUnit","_value": 0.0}}},{"_obj": "crop","angle": {"_unit": "angleUnit","_value": 0.0},"constrainProportions": false,"cropAspectRatioModeKey": {"_enum": "cropAspectRatioModeClass","_value": "pureAspectRatio"},"delete": true,"to": {"_obj": "rectangle","bottom": {"_unit": "pixelsUnit","_value": 368.421875},"left": {"_unit": "pixelsUnit","_value": 108.515625},"right": {"_unit": "pixelsUnit","_value": 603.375},"top": {"_unit": "pixelsUnit","_value": 0.0}}},{"_obj": "make","_target": [{"_ref": "contentLayer"}],"using": {"_obj": "contentLayer","type": {"_obj": "gradientLayer","angle": {"_unit": "angleUnit","_value": 90.0},"gradient": {"_obj": "gradientClassEvent","colors": [{"_obj": "colorStop","color": {"_obj": "RGBColor","blue": 0.0,"grain": 0.0,"red": 0.0},"location": 0,"midpoint": 50,"type": {"_enum": "colorStopType","_value": "userStop"}}, {"_obj": "colorStop","color": {"_obj": "RGBColor","blue": 0.0,"grain": 0.0,"red": 0.0},"location": 4096,"midpoint": 50,"type": {"_enum": "colorStopType","_value": "userStop"}}],"gradientForm": {"_enum": "gradientForm","_value": "customStops"},"interfaceIconFrameDimmed": 4096.0,"name": "Color to Transparent","transparency": [{"_obj": "transferSpec","location": 0,"midpoint": 50,"opacity": {"_unit": "percentUnit","_value": 100.0}}, {"_obj": "transferSpec","location": 4096,"midpoint": 50,"opacity": {"_unit": "percentUnit","_value": 0.0}}]},"gradientsInterpolationMethod":{"_enum": "gradientInterpolationMethodType","_value": "perceptual"},"type": {"_enum": "gradientType","_value": "linear"}}}}]},"outputs": [{"storage": "external","type": "image/jpeg",t"overwrite": true,"href": "string"}]}'

curl --request POST \
  --url https://image.adobe.io/pie/psdService/actionJSON \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer $token' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-api-key: $x-api-key' \
  --data '{"inputs": [{"href": "string","storage": "external"}],"options": {"additionalImages": [{"href": "string","storage": "external"}],"actionJSON": [{"ID": 3,"_obj": "placeEvent","freeTransformCenterState": {"_enum": "quadCenterState","_value": "QCSAverage"},"null": {"_kind": "local","_path": "PEGASUS_ACTION_JSON_OPTIONS_ADDITIONAL_IMAGES_0"},"offset": {"_obj": "offset","horizontal": {"_unit": "pixelsUnit","_value": 0},"vertical": {"_unit": "pixelsUnit","_value": 0}}},{"_obj": "autoCutout","sampleAllLayers": false},{"_obj":"make","at": {"_enum":"channel","_ref": "channel",  "_value": "mask"},"new": {  "_class": "channel"},"using": {  "_enum": "userMaskEnabled","_value":"revealSelection"}},{"_obj": "set","_target": [{"_property": "selection","_ref": "channel"  }],"to": {  "_enum": "ordinal","_value": "allEnum"}},{"_obj": "align","_target": [{"_enum": "ordinal","_ref": "layer"  }],"alignToCanvas": false,"using": {"_enum": "alignDistributeSelector",  "_value": "ADSBottoms"}},{"_obj": "align","_target": [{"_enum": "ordinal","_ref": "layer"  }],"alignToCanvas": false,"using": {"_enum": "alignDistributeSelector","_value": "ADSRights"}},{"_obj": "set","_target": [  {"_property": "selection","_ref": "channel"}],"to": {"_enum": "ordinal","_value": "none"}}]},"outputs":[{"type": "image/jpeg","href": "string","storage": "external"}]}'

post.description:
Converts an atn file to actionJSON.
To get status of this job, call [Status API](./#operation/pitsstatus). \
 To know more about this feature refer [Rendering Conversions](../features/#rendering--conversions)

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

post.description:
Edits a PSD for replacing embedded smart object and then generate renditions and/or save a new psd.
To get status of this job, call [Status API](./#operation/pitsstatus).\
 To know more about this feature refer [SmartObject](../features/#smartobject)

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

post.description:
Edit one or more text layers.
To get status of this job, call [Status API](./#operation/pitsstatus). \
 To know more about this feature refer [Text](../features/#text)

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://image.adobe.io/pie/psdService/text \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer $token' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-api-key: $x-api-key' \
  --data ' \
 {"inputs":[{"href":"<path_to_input_psd>","storage":"external"}],\
 "options":{"fonts":[{"storage":"external",\
 "href":"<path_to_font>"}],"layers":[{"name":"<name_of_text_layer_1_to_edit>",\
 "text":{"orientation":"horizontal","contents":"New text Contents 1",\
 "antiAlias":"antiAliasSharp",\
 "characterStyles":[{"autoKern":"metricsKern",\
 "fontPostScriptName":"<font_postscript_name>",\
 "fontCaps":"allCaps","size":25,"leading":20,\
 "tracking":20,"syntheticBold":true,"ligature":true,\
 "syntheticItalic":true,\
 "color":{"blue":100,"green":200,"red":163}}],\
 "paragraphStyles":[{"align":"right"}]}},{"name":"<name_of_text_layer_2_to_edit>",\
 "text":{"contents":"New text Contents 2","characterStyles":[{"size":45, \
 "stylisticAlternates":true,"leading":100,\
 "tracking":100,"baseline":"subScript",\
 "strikethrough":true,"underline":true,"verticalScale":150,\
 "horizontalScale":200,"color":{"blue":300,"green":100,"red":63}}]}}]},\
 "outputs":[{"href":"<path_to_output_psd>","type":"vnd.adobe.photoshop","storage":"external"}]}'

post.description:
Apply psd edits.
To get status of this job, call [Status API](./#operation/pitsstatus).\
 To know more about this feature refer [Document Level Edits](../features/#document-level-edits) and [Layer Level Edits](../features/#layer-level-edits)

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://image.adobe.io/pie/psdService/documentOperations \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer $token' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-api-key: $x-api-key' \
  --data '{"inputs":[{"href":"presigned_get_url","storage":"external"}],\
 "options":{"manageMissingFonts":"useDefault",\
 "globalFont":"MyriadPro-Bold", "fonts":[{"href":"presigned_get_url","storage":"external"}],\
 "document":{"canvasSize":{"bounds":{"top":200,"left":200,\
 "bottom":500,"right":500}},"imageSize":{"height":100,"width":100},"trim":{"basedOn":\
 "transparentPixels"}},\
 "layers":[{"add":{"insertTop":true},"name":"new adjustment layer",\
 "type":"adjustmentLayer","visible":true,\
 "adjustments":{"brightnessContrast":{"brightness":-23,"contrast":15}}},\
 {"add":{"insertBottom":true},"name":"new content layer","type":"fillLayer","visible":true,"fill":\
 {"solidColor":{"rgb":{"red":0,"green":255,"blue":255}}},\
 "blendOptions":{"opacity":90,"blendMode":"normal"}},\
 {"index":8,"locked":false,"name":"SO Layer",\
 "type":"smartObject","visible":true,\
 "add":{"insertTop":true},"input":{"href":"files/input/Simple.psd","storage":"external"},\
 "smartObject":{"linked":false}},{"id":33,"edit":{},"index":6,\
 "type":"textLayer","name":"my text layer",\
 "locked":true,"visible":true,\
 "bounds":{"top":50,"left":100,"width":500,"height":450},\
 "text":{"content":"NEW TEXT CHANGES","characterStyles":[{"fontSize":12.5,\
 "fontName":"Arial-BoldMT","orientation":"horizontal",\
 "fontColor":{"rgb":{"red":26086,"green":23002,"blue":8224}}}],\
 "paragraphStyles":[{"alignment":"left"}]},"blendOptions":{"opacity":90,\
 "blendMode":"normal"}},\
 {"add":{"insertAbove":{"id":53}},"name":"New Exposure Layer",\
 "type":"adjustmentLayer","locked":false,"visible":true,\
 "adjustments":{"exposure":{"exposure":0.25,\
 "offset":0.0049,"gammaCorrection":1.38}}},\
 {"edit":{},"id":78,"index":2,\
 "type":"adjustmentLayer","name":"Color Balance",\
 "locked":false,"visible":true,"mask":{"input":{"href":"files/abc.psd","storage":"external"},\
 "enabled":false,"linked":true,"offset":{"x":70,"y":50},"clip":true},\
 "adjustments":{"colorBalance":{"shadowLevels":[0,10,20],\
 "preserveLuminosity":true,"midtoneLevels":[30,40,50],"highlightLevels":[60,70,80]}}},\
 {"move":\
 {"insertAbove":{"name":"Hue Saturation"}},\
 "name":"new Image layer","type":"layer","visible":true,"input":{"href":"presigned_get_url","storage":"external"}},\
 {"edit":{},"id":77,"index":1,"type":"adjustmentLayer","name":"Hue Saturation","locked":false,"visible":true,\
 "adjustements":{"hueSaturation":{"channels":[{"channel":"master",\
 "hue":-5,"saturation":20,"lightness":0}],"colorize":false}}},\
  {"type":"backgroundLayer","index":0,"locked":true,"id":1,"visible":true,"name":"Background"}]},\
 "outputs":[{"href":"presigned_put_url","storage":"external",\
 "type":"image/jpeg","width":500,"trimToCanvas":false,\
 "layers":[{"id":77}]},{"href":"presigned_put_url","storage":"external",\
 "type":"image/vnd.adobe.photoshop"}]}'

post.description:
Create a new psd optionaly with layers and generate renditions or save as PSD.
To get status of this job, call [Status API](./#operation/pitsstatus).

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://image.adobe.io/pie/psdService/documentCreate \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer $token' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-api-key: $x-api-key' \
  --data '{"options":{"document":{"height":1000,"width":1000,"resolution":72,\
 "mode":"rgb", "fill":"transparent","depth":16},\
 "manageMissingFonts":"useDefault","globalFont":"MyriadPro-Bold",\
 "fonts":[{"href":"get_presigned_url","storage":"external"}],\
 "layers":[{"name":"new adjustment layer","type":"adjustmentLayer","visible":true,\
 "adjustments":{"brightnessContrast":{"brightness":-23,"contrast":15}}},{"name":"new content layer",\
 "type":"fillLayer","visible":true,"fill":{"solidColor":{"rgb":{"red":0,"green":255,"blue":255}}},\
 "blendOptions":{"opacity":90,"blendMode":"normal"}},{"locked":false,"name":"SO Layer",\
 "type":"smartObject","visible":true,"input":{"href":"files/input/Simple.psd","storage":"adobe"},\
 "smartObject":{"linked":false}},{"type":"textLayer","name":"my text layer","locked":true,"visible":true,\
 "bounds":{"top":50,"left":100,"width":500,"height":450},\
 "text":{"content":"NEW TEXT CHANGES",\
 "characterStyles":[{"fontSize":12.5,"fontName":"Arial-BoldMT",\
 "orientation":"horizontal","fontColor":{"rgb":{"red":26086,"green":23002,"blue":8224}}}],\
 "paragraphStyles":[{"alignment":"left"}]},"blendOptions":{"opacity":90,"blendMode":"normal"}},\
 {"name":"New Exposure Layer","type":"adjustmentLayer","locked":false,"visible":true,\
 "adjustments":{"exposure":{"exposure":0.25,"offset":0.0049,"gammaCorrection":1.38}}},\
 {"type":"adjustmentLayer","name":"Color Balance","locked":false,"visible":true,\
 "mask":{"input":{"href":"files/abc.psd","storage":"adobe"},\
 "enabled":false,"linked":true,\
 "offset":{"x":70,"y":50},"clip":true},\
 "adjustments":{"colorBalance":{"shadowLevels":[0,10,20],"preserveLuminosity":true,"midtoneLevels":[30,40,50],\
 "highlightLevels":[60,70,80]}}},{"name":"new Image layer","type":"layer","visible":true,\
 "input":{"href":"hget_presigned_url","storage":"external"}},\
 {"type":"adjustmentLayer","name":"Hue Saturation",\
 "locked":false,"visible":true,"adjustements":{"hueSaturation":\
 {"channels":[{"channel":"master","hue":-5,"saturation":20,"lightness":0}],"colorize":false}}},\
 {"type":"backgroundLayer","locked":true,"visible":true,"name":"Background"}]},\
"outputs":[{"href":"put_presigned_url","storage":"external",\
 "type":"image/jpeg","width":500,"trimToCanvas":false,\
"layers":[{"id":77}]},{"href":"put_presigned_url","storage":"external",\
 "type":"image/vnd.adobe.photoshop"}]}'

post.description:
Creates an artboard.
To get status of this job, call [Status API](./#operation/pitsstatus).\
 To know more about this feature refer [Artboards](../features/#artboards)

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

get.summary: Get the status of a job
get.description:
Returns the status of a job. Please expand `200 Successful operation` under
        `Responses` to know details of the status returned. This API is used for returning the status of
        a job for the apis [Create Renditions](./#operation/renditionCreate), [Execute actionJSON](./#operation/actionJSON),
        [Replace SmartObject](./#operation/smartObject), [Execute Photoshop Actions](./#operation/photoshopActions),
        [Execute Product Crop](./#operation/productCrop), [Execute Depth Blur](./#operation/depthBlur), [Edit Text Layers](./#operation/text),
        [Apply psd edits](./#operation/documentOperations), [Create a new psd](./#operation/documentCreate), [Create an artboard](./#operation/artboardCreate)

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The jobId to get status for.

post.description:
Get information about the PSD document, including metadata about the file as a whole as well as detailed information about the layers included in the file.
To get status of this job, call [Manifest Status API](./#operation/documentManifestStatus).

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

get.summary: Get the status of a job for documentManifest
get.description: Returns the status of the Get Manifest API. Please expand `200 Successful operation` under `Responses` to know details of the status returned.

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The jobId to get status for.
